poem:
### A Brief Passing

In the city of dreams,  
where laughter danced  
on celluloid wings,  
a light flickers out.  
The reels pause,  
scripts left in quietude.  
Yet echoes linger—  
the gentle touch  
of humor on hearts,  
a legacy sketched  
in frames of fleeting joy,  
in moments unspooled  
from time's own brief illness.
